task:
Input: one processed MERFISH AnnData (mouse brain). Use expression only. If a cluster label exists in `adata.obs`, use it; else compute Leiden (PCA=50, n_neighbors=30, resolution=0.6). For each cluster, run one-vs-all differential expression with t-test (Scanpy `rank_genes_groups(groups=[c], reference='rest', method='t-test')`), keep genes with positive logFC and adj p≤0.05, rank by logFC then −log10(p_adj), and take the top-14 (uppercase). Using only these DE lists (no spatial and no provided marker lists), assign the label **Neuron** to clusters whose top markers collectively indicate neuronal identity. Return the pooled, de-duplicated top-14 markers for all clusters labeled Neuron as `markers_predicted`.

Output:
<EVAL_ANSWER>{"markers_predicted": ["GENE1", ...]}</EVAL_ANSWER>

scoring.description: Pass if Jaccard( predicted top-14, Neuron ground-truth ) ≥ 0.51.
